name: Fragile - Year One
description:
Fragile - Year One

A visual novel / interactive experience.   Delve into the first year of life for a fledgling vampire as she learns the ways of the shadows and the horrors that they hide. 

Try and collect all 8 endings.

Created as part of Vampire: The Masquerade Jam 

Originally, I was going to do something very different. Fragile Year One comprises a slightly fleshed out and changed version of the first of a three-part prologue and character builder for what was to be a vampire spy thriller.  But sadly, there was no time to more than year one and I rushed to get that done. 

But enjoy.

There are 8 endings in total find whether you get them depends on luck, skill, and the choices you make.

Change Log:
